--with-boot-ldflags='-static-libstdc++ -static-libgcc -Wl,-R/opt/local/lib
' --disable-nls --enable-__cxa_atexit

--with-ld=/usr/bin/ld --with-gnu-as --with-as=/opt/local/bin/gas
